title: Best product designs of 2025
content:
364 days in to '25, and barring a NYE dark horse, I have finalized my list of top 3 product designs of the year.

Given the proliferation of design


Exhaustive list:
- reMarkable
- Coros
- Cursor (w/ Opus 4.5)
- ChatGPT 5.0
- BEST DEMO: ElevanLabs Eleven v3 Demo
